getClassArr

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Class> getClassArr(java.lang.String dicPath)
                                                 throws AgentServiceException
This method gets a path of a plugin directory and returns array list of implementors that loaded plugin that in that dir

Parameters:
dicPath - - the path of directory of plugIn
Returns:
array list of implementors
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if problem while trying to load the plugin, occurred
AgentServiceException - if the path not valid

getImplementorClass

public java.lang.Object getImplementorClass(java.lang.String str,
                                            java.net.URL url)
                                     throws AgentServiceException
Loading the class from the url that gets as a parameter and string with class name. The name of the jar has to be equal to the class name for loading. properties that we got.

Parameters:
str - - string with url
url - of the jar
Returns:
Object of the Class
Throws:
AgentServiceException - - in case of error while trying to load a class
